title: Zero Latency Software Agency
summary: Stop burning capital on software waste with our zero latency product lifecycle and budget planning framework, and guaranteed consulting services.

title: Top Tier Engineers
summary: From web programming to project management, each of our software consultants is expertly trained in multi-role autonomy to provide zero latency between development tasks, operating remotely within the U.S.A.

content.copy: Universal skill-sets mitigate communication bottlenecks, ensuring zero latency between task objectives and maximum productivity per every hour worked.

content.value: One of our multi-role experts can do the work of two competing consultants.

content.copy: All of our consulting agents operate remotely within the domestic U.S. while integrated with your team, providing exemplary written and communication skills along with mastery in their respective trade disciplines, as well as expert training in each crucial role of digital development.

title: Managed Chaos, Timeboxed.
summary: The SQUAD™ product lifecycle is our project management and budget planning framework, inspired by our mission to prevent projects from burning through capital.

content.copy: Statistics show that 70% of software development projects fail, with $50-150 billion of wasted capital spent annually in the U.S. on the mismanagement of analyses, scheduling, personnel, budgeting, or implementation.

Our mission of solving the software waste problem has led to the creation of our SQUAD™ budget planning methodology, which is the result of decades worth of CTO and project management experience, and the motivation behind all Fox Zero™ service offerings and products.

SQUAD™ is a simple hybrid methodology and process framework of both waterfall and agile project management principles and practices in the form of an iterative three-staged product lifecycle (PLM), applicable to the planning and processes of business initiatives and teams in any industry.

title: SQUAD™ Pricing
summary: Build or scale your product in 9 months for under $500k with our simple monthly SQUAD™ budgeted plans, curated by bottom-line consulting experts who know what software projects cost.

title: Wingman™ Bond Protection
summary: Stay covered with our Wingman™ warranty to guarantee minimum risk of project delivery time, budget, and quality so that you'll never be a statistic of software waste. Included with every project that we plan and develop.

summary: Stop burning capital on software waste with our zero latency product lifecycle and budget planning framework, and guaranteed consulting services.
